Package org.jgrapht.experimental.decomposition

Class Summary
BalancedClustering<V,E>  
Decomposition<V,E>  
DeletionStep<V,E> Performs a deletion step for the modified KRV procedure.
DummyFlow<V,E> Implements Edmond-Karp-Algorithm for Undirected Graphs WARNING: This is not an efficient implementation at all!
FlowDecomposer<V,E> Given a graph G and a feasible flow f on G computes: * A flow path decomposition * The induces cut C
MatchingStep<V,E> Contains the algorithm to perform a matching step in the modified KRV procedure.
ModifiedKRVProcedure<V,E> Implements Lemma 3.2 of 'Computing Cut-Based Hierarchical Decompositions in Almost linear time' (refered to as 'paper') by RŠcke et al.
Pair<A,B>  
PartitionA<V,E> Implements PartitionA from 'Computing Cut-Based Hierarchical Decompositions in Almost linear time' by RŠcke, Shah, TŠubig (pages 4 - 10) The Algorithm receives a Graph g and partitions it into sets Z_i s.t. for every Z_i: |Z_i| <= 3/4 |E|.
SplitGraph<V,E> Takes a Graph G and generates an equal graph that has 1 additional vertice for each edge e in G. *----* turns into *--*--*
SplitGraphVertex<V,E> Container class for a SplitGraph (contains either a vertex v \in V of the original Graph g or an edge e \in E of the original graph G)
Util
